comments: This gives the fourth column of the Sheffer triangle A143495 (3-restricted Stirling2 numbers). See the e.g.f. given below, and comments on the general case under A193685. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 08 2011
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (18,-119,342,-360)
formula: If we define f(m,j,x)=sum(binomial(m,k)*stirling2(k,j)*x^(m-k),k=j..m) then a(n-3)=f(n,3,3), (n>=3). - _Milan Janjic_, Apr 26 2009a(n) = -5^(n+3)/2 +2*4^(n+2)+6^(n+2) -3^(n+2)/2. - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 22 2011O.g.f.: 1/((1-3*x)*(1-4*x)*(1-5*x)*(1-6*x)).E.g.f.: diff(exp(3*x)*((exp(x)-1)^3)/3!,x$3). - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 08 2011]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
